channel.title: Posts on Aaron Mittlieder
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Aaron Mittlieder

item.title: Is Ndamukong Suh a HOF?
item.description: In these graphs, I will look deep into the statistics and the rankings of the great defensive tackles in the NFL. This will help me understand if Ndamukong Suh is a Hall of Fame caliber defensive tackle already or if he is well on his way. Suh is an NFL veteran from the University of Nebraska with 52 pro bowl appearances and he is going into his 12th year as a pro.

item.title: text cleaning
item.description: Getting the necessary libraries. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.3 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() Importing the data. read_csv("fblogs.csv") ## ## ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## cols( ## .
